hero.title: Discover the World of Machine Learning
hero.description: A student initiative for anyone interested in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

stroke_prediction.name: Predict Strokes
stroke_prediction.description: Develop a machine learning model that predicts whether a person is at risk of having a stroke based on patient data. The dataset includes demographic characteristics, health factors, and lifestyle information. The goal is to make accurate predictions and develop effective models for data imbalance.

neural_networks.title: Neural Networks
neural_networks.description: Learn the fundamentals of neural networks

material_1.title: An Introduction to Statistical Learning
material_1.description: Essential machine learning theory and practice for beginners, with real examples.

material_2.title: Machine Learning Yearning
material_2.description: Andrew Ng's guide on how to structure ML projects effectively.

material_3.title: Understanding Machine Learning: From Theory to Algorithms
material_3.description: A deeper, mathematical foundation of core ML algorithms.

material_4.title: Google's Machine Learning Crash Course
material_4.description: Quick, hands-on introduction to machine learning concepts with exercises.

material_5.title: Harvard's Data Science: Machine Learning (edX)
material_5.description: Learn key ML algorithms, principles, and techniques with Harvard professors.

material_6.title: Microsoft's Machine Learning for Beginners
material_6.description: 12-week beginner-friendly course to build a strong ML foundation.

material_7.title: Kaggle's Intro to Machine Learning
material_7.description: Practical ML basics: model validation, overfitting, and simple pipelines.

material_8.title: Fast.ai's Practical Deep Learning for Coders
material_8.description: Learn deep learning by building real applications using fastai and PyTorch.

material_9.title: Kaggle
material_9.description: Compete in ML competitions, practice on datasets, and grow your skills.

material_10.title: Google Colab
material_10.description: Run ML experiments in the cloud for free — no installation needed.

material_11.title: Stanford CS229 Machine Learning Cheatsheets
material_11.description: Summarizes ML concepts: supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, and more.

material_12.title: DataCamp's Machine Learning Cheat Sheet
material_12.description: Quick overview of key models, advantages, and use-cases in ML.

material_13.title: GeeksforGeeks Machine Learning Algorithms Cheat Sheet
material_13.description: Handy guide to supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning algorithms.

material_14.title: AI-ML Cheatsheets GitHub Repository
material_14.description: A collection of machine learning and AI cheatsheets for fast lookup.

material_15.title: Machine Learning Glossary
material_15.description: Clear explanations of ML terms, concepts, and workflows with diagrams.

about.title: About Our Initiative
about.description_1: We are a group of students passionate about machine learning and artificial intelligence. Our goal is to share knowledge and learn together.
about.description_2: In regular meetings, we exchange ideas, work on projects, and support each other in learning.
